sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-loans', templateUrl: './loans.component.html', styleUrls: ['./loans.component.css'] }) export class LoansComponent { }

Loan Solutions

Flexible financing options tailored to your needs

Mortgage Loans

  • Fixed Rate Mortgages
    • Rates as low as 3.25% APR
    • 15, 20, or 30-year terms
    • No hidden fees
    • Rate lock guarantee
  • Adjustable Rate Mortgages
    • Competitive initial rates
    • Flexible term options
    • Rate caps for protection
    • Convert to fixed rate option

Personal Loans

  • Signature Loans
    • Up to $50,000
    • Rates from 5.99% APR
    • No collateral required
    • Quick approval process
  • Debt Consolidation
    • Combine multiple debts
    • Lower monthly payments
    • Fixed interest rates
    • Simplified repayment

Business Loans

  • Term Loans
    • Up to $500,000
    • Competitive rates
    • Flexible terms
    • Fast funding
  • Commercial Real Estate
    • Property financing
    • Construction loans
    • Refinancing options
    • Expert guidance

Specialty Loans

Auto Loans
  • New and used vehicles
  • Rates from 2.99% APR
  • Terms up to 72 months
  • Easy application process
Education Loans
  • Competitive rates
  • Flexible repayment
  • No prepayment penalty
  • Interest-only options

Home Equity

Home Equity Loans
  • Fixed rates
  • Up to 90% LTV
  • Tax advantages
  • Home improvements
HELOC
  • Flexible draws
  • Interest-only options
  • Competitive rates
  • No annual fee

Why Choose SecureBank Loans

Expert Guidance

Dedicated loan officers to help you choose the right solution

Fast Processing

Quick approval and efficient closing process

Competitive Rates

Market-leading rates and flexible terms

Online Tools

Easy application and loan management
